projects.title: ATS Resume Analyzer — JD Fit Copilot
projects.problem: Tailoring resumes to specific JDs was ad hoc; no visibility into ATS keyword coverage or evidence.
projects.approach: Streamlit app with PDF/DOCX parsing, JD keyword extraction, ATS-style scoring, semantic evidence ranking and optional LLM suggestions.
projects.outcome: Turns a JD + resume into explainable fit scores and ranked bullets in seconds; makes resume iterations data-driven instead of guesswork.

projects.title: Polimap — Geo-analytics
projects.problem: Local area reporting needed fast spatial insight.
projects.approach: Python/SQL ETL, PostGIS spatial joins, FastAPI backend for Leaflet UI, RBAC + QA checks.
projects.outcome: Heatmaps render ~10k points in ~3s; reliable spatial metrics for field teams.

projects.title: PowerCo — Churn Baseline
projects.problem: Identify high-risk customers while keeping false positives manageable.
projects.approach: EDA & feature engineering; XGBoost with threshold calibration; recall-first framing.
projects.outcome: Recall ≈0.97 @ 0.30 threshold (precision trade-off noted); clear stakeholder guidance.

projects.title: Citi — FP&A Pack
projects.problem: Month-end needed clear variance explanations & scenario notes (Basel III-aware).
projects.approach: KPI/variance packs in Excel + SQL; standardised price/mix/volume drivers; templated exec notes.
projects.outcome: Faster, cleaner decisions; reusable packs reduced rework cycles.
